name: shinobi
description: Shinobi is a self-hosted, web-based CCTV and NVR solution. It supports multiple camera vendors, motion detection, recording, and alerting, aimed at advanced but user-friendly video surveillance setups.
features: Multi-camera support: Connects to IP cameras from various vendors via RTSP, ONVIF, and HTTP streams.
Motion detection: Triggers recording and alerts based on configurable motion zones and sensitivity.
Recording management: Schedules continuous or event-based recording with retention policies.
Live viewing: Streams multiple camera feeds simultaneously in a grid layout.
Event timeline: Displays detected motion events with thumbnails for quick review.
User permissions: Controls access to specific cameras and features with role-based accounts.
Plugin system: Extends functionality with community plugins for notifications and integrations.
Mobile access: Responsive web interface works on smartphones and tablets.
Storage backends: Supports local storage, network shares, and cloud storage options.
API access: Provides REST API for automation and third-party integrations.
Alert notifications: Sends alerts via email, webhooks, or push notifications on motion events.
Hardware acceleration: Leverages GPU encoding for efficient video processing.
